review: I have had a lot of issues with poor performance.  It frequently pauses while playing videos in YouTube and Nerflix some days. I am unable to use HBOGO because my cable service provider isn't recognized. It's been more frustrating than useful.  I recommend spending a little more money and getting a better media device.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Easy as pie to set up, but not so great at maintaining signal. I find it buffering quite a bit - and it's the closest item to my wireless router, only about 16-18 ft away. Occasionally loses signal altogether, forcing me to unplug the dongle and reboot - which is very inconvenient. I put up with it since I got it on sale and don't use it that often, but wireless connectivity issues are often a problem, especially compared to my other 2 smart TVs and my Roku unit, which are trouble-free.
